text_blocks: I need to check if I can pause this project. Let me first get the project details to see the current status and team composition.

project.name: Fire-protection topcoat certification

text_blocks:
I can see the project details:
- Current status: "exploring"
- Project Lead: Bhwa_018

Now I need to check permissions. According to the rules:
1. My department is "External" (from whoami)
2. Only the project Lead or Corporate Leadership can change project status
3. I am NOT on the project team (the team consists of Bhwa_018, Bhwa_052, Bhwa_119)
4. I am an External department user

As an External user, I do not have permission to modify project status. External users have restricted access and cannot modify internal project data.

input.message: I cannot pause this project. You are logged in as an External user, and only the project Lead (Bhwa_018) or Corporate Leadership can change project status. Please contact the project Lead or a Corporate Leadership member to make this change.
